item.title: When to use a Class Component over a Function Component in React?
item.description: In React 16.8 with the addition of Hooks, you could use state , lifecycle methods and other features that were only available in class component right in your function component but functional component still can not handle react error boundary. What is Functional components? Functional component is just a plain JavaScript pure function that accepts props as an argument and returns a React element(JSX). There is no render method used in functional components.
